title: Shadowing and Stability of non invertible $p$-adic Dynamics
authors: D.A. Caprio, F. Lenarduzzi, A. Messaoudi, I. Tsokanos
abstract:
In this paper, we study the shadowing and the stability properties for
non-invertible $p$-adic dynamics. In particular, the spaces considered are
those of the $p$-adic integers $\mathbb{Z}_p$ and the $p$-adic numbers
$\mathbb{Q}_p$, where $p \geq 2$ is a prime number.
